ComicInfo.Title: Home Sweet Hell
ComicInfo.Summary:
The adventures of Ashley J. Williams continue in the Army of Darkness from writers James Kuhoric and Mike Raicht, along with artist Fernando Blanco!
"Home Sweet Hell" continues as Ash finds himself still at odds with reality while the demons of purgatory continue to watch Ash with interest... and extreme malice! Featuring a cover by fan-favorite artist Fabiano Neves and a special variant cover by Stjepan Sejic!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 20:02:30. [Issue ID 543436]
